jexer

Class TVScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.TWidget
      • jexer.TVScroller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TWidget>

    public class TVScroller
extends TWidget
    TVScroller implements a simple vertical scroll bar.
